"Rasta":
"That new Mag...
You're a Meteorn, aren't you?"
"There's something I need to ask you. Will you listen to me?"
"Meteorn Mags are more advanced than ours, so you should have an easier time getting back in touch with him."
"Would you please go and find out what's happened? Thank you for listening to my request."

"I see. You must be very busy...
In that case, please remember me when you next have time."
